CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Enterprises relative to Ironclad Industries?
SRP.A: Zenith Enterprises is {below} Ironclad Industries in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Dynamics relative to Lumina Solutions?
SRP.A: Meridian Dynamics is {above} Lumina Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Verdant Ventures relative to Lumina Solutions?
SRP.A: Verdant Ventures is {above} Lumina Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {AstraCorp}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Lumina Solutions}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironclad Industries's maximum Turnover Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironclad Industries's maximum Turnover Rate is in {2002}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AstraCorp's minimum Turnover Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: AstraCorp's minimum Turnover Rate is in {1995}.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 1998, did the total Turnover Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1998 and 2004?
NC.A: The change in total turnover rate between 1997 and 1998 was {larger} than between 1998 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2006, did the total Turnover Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1997 and 2004?
NC.A: The change in total turnover rate between 2002 and 2006 was {larger} than between 1997 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 1998, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 2003 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between 1996 and 1998 was {higher} than between 2003 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 2003, did the total Turnover Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1993 and 2006?
NC.A: The change in total turnover rate between 1996 and 2003 was {smaller} than between 1993 and 2006.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {AstraCorp} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Lumina Solutions and Ironclad Industries first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Lumina Solutions and Ironclad Industries first exchanged leading positions in {1997}.
